head.title: National Briefing | South: Florida: New Job For Lieutenant Governor

hedline.hl1: National Briefing | South: Florida: New Job For Lieutenant Governor

abstract.p: Florida Lt Gov Frank Brogan is selected by Florida Atlantic University to be its next president (S)

block.p: Trustees at Florida Atlantic University selected the state's lieutenant governor, Frank Brogan, left, as the university's next president. Mr. Brogan, 49, who is expected to leave state government on March 1, earned a master's degree at Florida Atlantic and was state's education commissioner before being elected twice as lieutenant governor. Gov. Jeb Bush has not said whom he wants to replace Mr. Brogan.
